title: Chapter 1876 - A Toast To A Thousand Years
body:
Chapter 1876 - A Toast To A Thousand Years

He only became an Immortal King a few months now, but he’d already proven his Dao and entered the Great Realm?

Who’d dare believe such a thing?

Who’d… dare even imagine such a thing?

Chu Shentong certainly did not, so he was completely dumbstruck.

Suddenly, Su Yi said out of nowhere, “Tell me, if I threatened Divine Son Jin Zhuliu’s life, could I find your hiding spot?”

Chu Shentong’s pupils constricted. He laughed coldly and was just about to say something when… 

Bang!

Su Yi tightened his fist and shattered his avatar of will.

“I'd have killed you both eventually, no matter what you said,” said Su Yi, sweeping his gaze across the hollowed-out Jade Firmament Immortal Island. “Also, there’s no longer any need for this place to exist…”

He turned and left, then rode off on his little flat boat.

The enormous Jade Firmament Immortal Island, so massive that it was like a continent in its own right, split into chunks behind him, then sank into the ocean’s depths. 

Su Yi sprawled out languidly at the tail end of the boat, his eyes narrowed in contentment and a jug of wine placed beside him. He looked perfectly relax...
original_title: Chapter 1876 - A Toast to a Thousand Years
